perturbation.original_text: This Amendment No. 1 (the "Amendment"), entered into by and between Stremick's Heritage Foods, LLC ("Heritage") Premier Nutrition Corporation ("Premier") is effective as of June 11, 2018 ("Amendment Effective Date") and amends that certain Manufacturing Agreement between Heritage and Premier dated July 1, 2017 ("Agreement"). Heritage and Premier are each referred to herein as a "Party" and collectively as the "Parties."
perturbation.changed_text: This Amendment No. 1 (the "Amendment"), entered into by and between Stremick's Heritage Foods, LLC ("Heritage") Premier Nutrition Corporation ("Premier") is effective as of June 11, 2018 ("Amendment Effective Date") and amends that certain Manufacturing Agreement between Heritage and Premier dated July 1, 2017 ("Agreement"). Heritage and Premier are each referred to herein as a "Party", and collectively as the "Vendors."
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Parties' is replaced with 'Vendors'. This creates confusion since the contract initially defines 'Parties' as Heritage and Premier, but then uses 'Vendors', which could imply other entities involved in the manufacturing agreement, thus changing obligations.

perturbation.original_text: During the Term of this Agreement, Premier shall be required to purchase a Minimum Annual Order Volume ("MAOV") of [***] ("Units") for the twelve-month period commencing July 1, 2018 and ending June 30, 2019. The MAOV [***] Units for each twelve-month period commencing July 1, 2019 through the end of the Term, contingent upon commercial aseptic production at Heritage's [***] facility and approval of that facility by Premier by January 1, 2019. For the avoidance of doubt, the six-month period commencing July 1, 2022 and ending December 31, 2022, Premier will be required to purchase [***] (the twelve-month periods and the six-month period are each a "Contract Period").
perturbation.changed_text: During the Term of this Agreement, Premier shall be required to purchase a Minimum Annual Order Quantity ("MAOQ") of [***] ("Units") for the twelve-month period commencing July 1, 2018 and ending June 30, 2019. The MAOQ [***] Units for each twelve-month period commencing July 1, 2019 through the end of the Term, contingent upon commercial aseptic production at Heritage's [***] facility and approval of that facility by Premier by January 1, 2019. For the avoidance of doubt, the six-month period commencing July 1, 2022 and ending December 31, 2022, Premier will be required to purchase [***] (the twelve-month periods and the six-month period are each a "Contract Period").
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Minimum Annual Order Volume' (MAOV) is replaced with 'Minimum Annual Order Quantity' (MAOQ). The contract uses these terms interchangeably without defining if volume and quantity mean the same thing in this specific context. This creates ambiguity regarding whether Premier needs to meet a volume-based target, a quantity-based target, or both. The change from 'volume' to 'quantity' can change the obligations.

perturbation.original_text: Except as otherwise specified above in this Amendment, all other terms, conditions and covenants of the Agreement shall remain in full force and effect.
perturbation.changed_text: Except as otherwise specified above in this Amendment, all other terms, conditions and obligations of the Agreement shall remain in full force and effect.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'covenants' is replaced with 'obligations'. While seemingly similar, covenants are specific types of promises in a contract. By using 'obligations' instead, it becomes unclear if specific covenants within the original agreement are still considered legally binding covenants or just general obligations. This could weaken the enforceability of certain sections of the contract.
